author: deweese
msg: 1) PR 1937 Accept headers in Batik:
a) Batik now sends "Batik/1.0" as it's HTTP User Agent header
We need to add a more centralized place for this...
i) ParsedURL now has interfaces for setting up the user agent
b) Batik now properly sets up HTTP 'Accept' header in most cases
i) ParsedURL now has interfaces for indicating the 'expected'
mime-types on a openStream(Raw).
c) Batik should now properly set up HTTP 'Accept-Encoding' header (gzip).
i) ParsedURL will now for openStream set Accept-Encoding to
gzip (openStreamRaw will not).
d) ImageTagRegistry now has interfaces to get the list of mime-types
associated with the Registered handlers (this is used when connecting).
e) Many previous uses of URL are now replaced with ParsedURL (to take
advantage of the accept header stuff - no public interfaces have
been changed).
2) The Image data cache can now be flushed.
a) Caching is now split out of the GraphicsNodeRed (now handled by
StaticRenderer).
b) Exposed a preliminary interface for flushing data on
...gvt.renderer.ImageRenderer & JGVTComponent
Expect these interfaces to change in the future! they are there
for testing and development purposes until better infrastructure
can be developed.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Added a new radial Gradient test
1a) Modified the radial gradient tests so they use they
test handling of color-rendering hints.
2) Fixed a bug in CSSUtilities with the parsing of color-rendering property.
3) Made RadialGradientPaintContext pay attention to the rendering hints.
4) Modified out MultipleGradientPaintContext builds gradient lut, so
it can use the simple version more often.
5) Removed ImageLoader since it is no longer used anywhere (functionality
is now provided by ext/awt/image/spi package).

author: deweese
msg: 1) Removed use of java.net.URL.getPath (JDK 1.3ism).
2) Fixed handling of stops that use the same offset value.
3) Added test file for #1 (also test complex lookup gradient code).
4) Added anti-aliased implementation of gradient lookup code.
The use of anti-aliasing is currently controlled by the
private final static USE_ANTI_ALIAS in RadialGradientPaintContext.
Compare radialGradient2 with and without anti-aliasing :)

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed a bug in the Base64DecoderStream.
2) Re-implemented Base64 Encoding as a Stream (round tripping now works).
3) Added test cases for Base64 Encoding/Decoding
4) Added test cases for ParsedURL parsing.
5) Removed old Base64Encoder/Decoder and base classes.
